function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear relationship between absorptive capacity and adaptive capacity","Impact":"Ineffective formulation of adaptive capacity may hinder post-disaster recovery","Mitigation":"Clarify the relationship between absorptive and adaptive capacity to ensure effective post-disaster recovery","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Authors, researchers, and policymakers interested in post-disaster recovery","Owner":"Authors, researchers, and policymakers"},{"Description":"Difficulty comprehending extreme values of the metric","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the metric may lead to ineffective risk assessment and mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Provide additional guidance or constraints for the metric to ensure meaningful interpretation","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Risk experts, policymakers, and researchers using the metric","Owner":"Originators of the metric, risk experts, and policymakers"},{"Description":"Exponential growth function may not always represent system behavior","Impact":"Misapplication of the exponential growth function may lead to inaccurate resilience assessments","Mitigation":"Consider alternative functions or models that better capture system behavior","Technologies":"Statistical modeling software, system behavior analysis tools","People":"Risk experts, researchers, and policymakers involved in resilience assessment","Owner":"Risk experts, researchers, and policymakers"}]}
